title: Reborn As A Little Fiancée Of Paranoid Vampire - Novel Updates
tags: Average-looking Protagonist   Awkward Protagonist   Beasts   Early Romance   Fantasy World   Fated Lovers   Female Protagonist   Mysterious Family Background   Vampires   Werebeasts
author: 牛皮
description:
Yin Li had to rely on blood to survive every day. He was withdrawn, cold and arrogant, and kept a distance from everyone, but he didn’t reject Zhou Chuning, who insisted on bringing him breakfast every day.

And Zhou Chuning was gentle to him, but one day he showed his fangs.

After rebirth, Zhou Chuning secretly made up her mind to stay calm when Yinli would show his fangs she must tell him she liked his fangs.

In the previous life, Yinli was regarded as a monster and Zhou Chuning was his hostage. After her death, he held her body and slaughtered many, blood flowed into a river, and the whole city was dyed red. In this life, she must prevent that kind of thing from happening again.>
